item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Platykus, my laboratory for exploring platform engineering on Kubernetes clusters in public clouds. Who am I? I love learning new things and building interesting and useful stuff with that knowledge, as well as sharing it with other like-minded people. I’m an experienced polyglot programmer with a background in full-lifecycle systems development, primarily of highly-available and scalable distributed systems including commercial massively-multiplayer online games and big data processing and storage systems.
